meanings.definition: Chemical substances used in agriculture to enhance crop production.
meanings.sent1: Farmers rely on agrichemicals to help their crops grow strong and healthy.
meanings.sent2: The agrichemicals sprayed on the fields are essential for increasing yields.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit accidentally spilled agrichemicals all over the garden!
meanings.sent4: Her garden bloomed like never before after she applied agrichemicals to the soil.
meanings.sent5: The powerful impact of agrichemicals on plant growth is truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: The use of chemicals in farming to control pests and diseases.
meanings.sent1: Agrichemicals play a crucial role in protecting crops from harmful insects.
meanings.sent2: Farmers carefully select agrichemicals to keep their fields free from pests.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit accidentally spilled agrichemicals all over the garden!
meanings.sent4: She fought off the invading pests by using agrichemicals strategically.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of agrichemicals in pest control is undeniable.

meanings.definition: Agricultural products that contain chemical additives for various purposes.
meanings.sent1: Some consumers prefer organic foods over those treated with agrichemicals.
meanings.sent2: The market offers a wide range of agrichemical-treated fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit accidentally spilled agrichemicals all over the garden!
meanings.sent4: The cake recipe called for agrichemicals to enhance its flavor and texture.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of using agrichemicals in food production are debated among experts.
